translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: [on radio] Good evening, everybody, Anthony Gargano here,
translation.zh: 大家晚上好 我是安东尼·加加诺

translation.en: I've got breaking news.
translation.zh: 我有一条突发消息一个令人伤心的消息

translation.en: And it's very, very sad news. I've just confirmed it.
translation.zh: 我有一条突发消息一个令人伤心的消息 我刚刚确认了

translation.en: I don't even want to say it.
translation.zh: 我不想说出口

translation.en: But Rex Merrick, you know our beloved Rex,
translation.zh: 但是雷克斯·梅里克 我们敬爱的雷克斯

translation.en: owner of the Sixers, has passed away tonight.
translation.zh: 76人队的老板 今晚去世了

translation.en: I'm at a loss for words.
translation.zh: 我不知道说什么好了

translation.en: He was one of the great people.
translation.zh: 他是个大好人

translation.en: He was one of our people.
translation.zh: 他是我们的一员

translation.en: He grew up dirt poor in Altoona, Pennsylvania.
translation.zh: 他在宾州的阿尔图纳长大小时候家里一贫如洗

translation.en: He was just like everybody else in his town.
translation.zh: 他跟城里的其他人一样

translation.en: He built great wealth, but he never distanced himself from us.
translation.zh: 他积累了巨大的财富 但他从不跟我们保持距离

translation.en: And this is why we lost a great one today.
translation.zh: 所以今天我们失去了一个了不起的人

translation.en: -So Rex, this is for you. -[line ringing]
translation.zh: 雷克斯 这首歌献给你

translation.en: [Rex on phone] Hi, I'm not here right now.
translation.zh: 嗨 现在我不在

translation.en: Leave me a message and I'll get back to you when I can.
translation.zh: 请留言 我会尽快打给你

translation.en: -[Stanley] Leon. -Hey.
translation.zh: -利昂-嘿

translation.en: -Julius. -Hey.
translation.zh: -朱利叶斯-嘿

translation.en: Rex loved you, man.
translation.zh: 雷克斯很爱你 伙计

translation.en: Thanks, pal.
translation.zh: 谢谢 伙计 我…我不敢相信…

translation.en: I just, I can't believe… I just showed my daughter footage of you jamming,
translation.zh: 谢谢 伙计 我…我不敢相信… 我刚给我女儿看完你们灌篮的录像…

translation.en: and it just brought back so many nice memories.
translation.zh: 让我想起了很多美好的回忆

translation.en: You can't let 'em forget. -Right, Stanley? -No, no.
translation.zh: -不能让他们忘记 对吧 斯坦利？-对

translation.en: I'll let you old friends catch up.
translation.zh: 我让你们叙叙旧

translation.en: -Okay. Stay well. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 好 保重 谢谢

translation.en: -Nice touch with the suit. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 嘿 你穿西装很好看

translation.en: Leon, man, I can't believe this.
translation.zh: 嗯 利昂 我无法相信

translation.en: Anything you ever need, call me, man.
translation.zh: 有什么需要尽管找我

translation.en: Yeah. I got to make the rounds. I appreciate you.
translation.zh: 嗯 我去跟大家打招呼 谢谢你

translation.en: -Love you, bro. -Love you too, Leon.
translation.zh: -我爱你 兄弟-我也爱你 利昂

translation.en: Let's talk soon, 22.
translation.zh: 我们再联系 22号

translation.en: Trying to think of something to say to you besides "I'm sorry."
translation.zh: 我不知道该说什么只能说“我很遗憾”

translation.en: It doesn't seem enough.
translation.zh: 这似乎不够

translation.en: I heard you're moving to the bench.
translation.zh: 我听说你要当教练了

translation.en: Uncle Connie's office. Dad was so excited for you.
translation.zh: 康尼叔叔的办公室 爸爸替你感到很高兴

translation.en: "We need a spark, Katherine."
translation.zh: “我们需要一个有激情的人 凯瑟琳”

translation.en: No, man. Your father,
translation.zh: 嗯 你父亲

translation.en: he mentioned it to me years ago, but with my past, you know,
translation.zh: 几年前他跟我提过 但考虑到我的过去我以为他只是说说而已

translation.en: I figured he'd rather forget about it.
translation.zh: 但考虑到我的过去我以为他只是说说而已

translation.en: He'd never forget about you, Sugerman.
translation.zh: 他是不会忘记你的 苏格曼

translation.en: So my brother's going to be taking over the team.
translation.zh: 我哥将接管球队

translation.en: You're bailing on us?
translation.zh: 你要抛弃我们？

translation.en: No, I'm gonna keep my seat on the board. Vin's going to run the day-to-day.
translation.zh: 不是的 我会保留董事会席位但阿文将负责日常管理

translation.en: -[man] To your pops. -[men] To Rex.
translation.zh: -敬你老爸-敬雷克斯！

translation.en: He really wants this.
translation.zh: 他很想这样

translation.en: -[whistle blowing] -[indistinct shouting]
translation.zh: （斯坦利·苏格曼 助理教练）

translation.en: [man] Come on, Haas, make him work. Too easy, Haas, too easy!
translation.zh: 嘿 快点 哈斯 让他忙起来太容易了 哈斯 太容易了！

translation.en: -Come on, Haas. -[blows whistle] Whoa, whoa.
translation.zh: 快点 哈斯！

translation.en: No, can't have your arm straight like that.
translation.zh: 不对 手臂不要这样伸直

translation.en: Put your forearm into T's back, all right?
translation.zh: 用前臂顶住T的背部 懂吗？

translation.en: Dig it in there. Okay? You decide where you want him to go.
translation.zh: 顶住这里 你让他去那边他就去那边

translation.en: Like Jrue Holiday, bro.
translation.zh: -像朱·霍利迪那样 兄弟-对 没错

translation.en: Exactly. Take him out of his comfort zone.
translation.zh: -像朱·霍利迪那样 兄弟-对 没错 让他走出他的舒适区

translation.en: -Huh? I don't understand what that is. -Did you sleep last night at all?
translation.zh: 我听不懂 你昨晚睡觉了吗？

translation.en: -Do your work early. -[Stanley] Let's go again.
translation.zh: -快点干正事 来吧-我们再来一次

translation.en: -Ready? -Okay.
translation.zh: -准备好了吗？-嗯

translation.en: -Come on, Haas. Make him work. -Don't let him go baseline.
translation.zh: -来吧 哈斯 防住他！-别让他冲到底线 快点 哈斯！太轻松了！

translation.en: Hey, just focus.
translation.zh: 嘿 专心点

translation.en: -Go again! -[man] Make him work.
translation.zh: -再来一次！-哈斯 防住他

translation.en: Hey, Stan. You got a minute?
translation.zh: 嘿 斯坦！ 有空吗？

translation.en: You want me now?
translation.zh: 现在吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -All right.
translation.zh: -对-好吧

translation.en: How's he doing?
translation.zh: 他表现如何？

translation.en: We're working on it. He's young. We're going to get him there.
translation.zh: 我们还在努力 他还年轻 但我们会把他调教好的

translation.en: I fucked up. Shouldn't have drafted Haas.
translation.zh: 我搞砸了 -不该选哈斯的-不要这样说

translation.en: -I wouldn't say that. -To my face?
translation.zh: -不该选哈斯的-不要这样说 有话直说

translation.en: I would say it to your face.
translation.zh: 我会有话直说的

translation.en: My father always appreciated your honesty. I'm working on it. I really am.
translation.zh: 我父亲一直欣赏你的坦诚 我在努力做到像他那样 真的

translation.en: Cool.
translation.zh: -好-我只有一项任务

translation.en: I have one job, to maximize this team's chances
translation.zh: -好-我只有一项任务 就是不惜一切手段

translation.en: of winning an NBA championship by any means necessary.
translation.zh: 尽最大可能让球队夺得NBA冠军

translation.en: Hell with the naysayers. Right?
translation.zh: 让反对的人去死 对吧？

translation.en: You're not wrong.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: I'm glad to hear you say that.
translation.zh: 你这样说让我很高兴

translation.en: Got the Hawks' pick next year, we can't afford to miss.
translation.zh: 我们拿到了明年老鹰队的首轮选秀权 绝对不能选错人

translation.en: To be champion requires sacrifice.
translation.zh: 想夺冠就要做出牺牲曼努将替补上场

translation.en: Manu coming off the bench. That's this. That's you.
translation.zh: 想夺冠就要做出牺牲曼努将替补上场 就是这事 你去

translation.en: You're valuable as a coach, you're indispensable as a scout.
translation.zh: 你是个不可多得的教练 但你更是个不可或缺的球探

translation.en: I don't want to be out there anymore. I never wanted to be out there.
translation.zh: 我不想再当球探了 我从来都不想

translation.en: I'm not asking.
translation.zh: 我不是在征求你的意见

translation.en: I haven't been home on my daughter's birthday for nine years running, Vin.
translation.zh: 阿文 我已经连着九年没在家里 陪我女儿过生日了

translation.en: [Vin] Stan.
translation.zh: 斯坦

translation.en: Find me that missing piece, you're right back on the bench coaching.
translation.zh: 你帮我找到那个关键球员我就让你回来做教练

translation.en: So what you gonna do, Sugerbear?
translation.zh: 那你打算怎么办 熊宝宝？

translation.en: What can I do?
translation.zh: 我能怎么办？

translation.en: Call Vin right now and say,
translation.zh: 马上给他们打电话

translation.en: "Kiss my fat ass and fuck your five-star hotels."
translation.zh: 让他们给你舔屁股让他们的五星级酒店见鬼去吧

translation.en: You don't need this.
translation.zh: 你不需要这个

translation.en: It's not as simple as that.
translation.zh: 没那么简单

translation.en: How can such a beautiful woman have such horrifying feet?
translation.zh: 你这么漂亮的女人脚怎么这么可怕？

translation.en: -[laughs] -What is this yellow thing?
translation.zh: 这个黄色的是什么？

translation.en: It's a callus from exercise. Remember exercise?
translation.zh: 这是运动产生的老茧还记得运动吗？

translation.en: So you're just gonna give up on your dream?
translation.zh: 你打算就这么放弃梦想吗？

translation.en: [Stanley] Guys in their 50s don't have dreams.
translation.zh: 50多岁的男人没有梦想

translation.en: They have nightmares and eczema.
translation.zh: 只有噩梦和湿疹

translation.en: There was only one guy who knew what I was capable of, and he died.
translation.zh: 世上只有一个人了解我的能力 结果他死了

translation.en: [woman in Spanish] Welcome to Mallorca, Spain.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到西班牙的马略卡

translation.en: The local temperature is 30 degrees Celsius…
translation.zh: 当地气温为摄氏30度

translation.en: [Leon in English] Yo, Double Deuce, I heard you back on that road, man.
translation.zh: 22号 我听说你重操旧业了

translation.en: I'm in Spain too, with a client, so let's have breakfast.
translation.zh: 我也在西班牙跟一个客户在一起 一起吃个早饭吧

translation.en: Look at this pool. Check it out.
translation.zh: 你看这个泳池 伙计 你看

translation.en: -[Stanley] No, I can't look at that. -[Leon] Yeah, you can.
translation.zh: 不行 我不能乱看 伙计 -不 你可以-不行 那样我会倒霉的

translation.en: No, that's going to get me in trouble.
translation.zh: -不 你可以-不行 那样我会倒霉的

translation.en: -One look, just one look. -No. I'll get in…
translation.zh: -就看一眼 来吧-不 -特蕾莎会打死我的-就看一眼

translation.en: Teresa will kick the shit out of me.
translation.zh: -特蕾莎会打死我的-就看一眼

translation.en: I swear to God, I saw a Victoria's Secret mannequin one time,
translation.zh: 我对天发誓有一次我看了一眼维密的人体模型

translation.en: and T was pissed off at me.
translation.zh: 惹得她大发脾气

translation.en: I came to talk to you about something.
translation.zh: 我找你有事商量

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Why don't you come and just be an agent with me?
translation.zh: 过来跟我做经纪人吧

translation.en: Got an open spot, I got all the partners on board.
translation.zh: 我缺个经纪人 我的合伙人都同意了

translation.en: For me? If I do that, then,
translation.zh: 找我？如果我这样做

translation.en: there's no room for growth. I still want to coach.
translation.zh: 那就没有发展空间了我还想当教练呢

translation.en: This Philly thing, there's room to grow there?
translation.zh: 你待在费城就有发展空间了吗？

translation.en: At least I'm still in the league, you know.
translation.zh: 至少还在联盟里混

translation.en: Vin came to see me last week.
translation.zh: 上个礼拜阿文找过我

translation.en: Talk about Zeke.
translation.zh: 谈了齐克的事

translation.en: Talk about Zeke? He's going one. We're out.
translation.zh: 齐克？他参加第一轮选秀我们没机会

translation.en: He could trade up, package Embiid with that King's pick.
translation.zh: 他愿意交换用恩比德和国王队的选秀权

translation.en: That idiot's talking about trading Embiid? Are you kidding me?
translation.zh: 那个白痴想把恩比德交易出去？你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: Look, nobody's safe now.
translation.zh: 听着 现在没人是安全的

translation.en: Guy like Vin, he wants to put his fingerprints on the team.
translation.zh: 阿文那家伙想让大家知道现在球队是他说了算

translation.en: Just think about my offer, Deuce.
translation.zh: 考虑一下吧 22号

translation.en: Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: 好的 感谢你替我着想

translation.en: -I appreciate you looking out for me. -Always, man.
translation.zh: 好的 感谢你替我着想 不客气

translation.en: And do me a favor, please look at these titties. I'll take the blame.
translation.zh: 帮个忙 拜托你看看这些奶子 我来背黑锅 你就看看吧

translation.en: -Just check them out. -All right.
translation.zh: 我来背黑锅 你就看看吧 好吧

translation.en: -Those are my titties. -Those are yours.
translation.zh: -那是我的奶子-那是你的

translation.en: -Yeah. -They actually kind of look like yours.
translation.zh: 还真是有点像你的奶子

translation.en: I'm about two sandwiches away from those titties. Yeah.
translation.zh: 我再吃两个三明治奶子就会变成那样了

translation.en: So how long has our boy been off the injury reserve list?
translation.zh: 他从伤员名单上消失多久了？

translation.en: Garcia's knee's swollen. He's not going to play.
translation.zh: 加尔萨的膝盖肿了 他上不了场

translation.en: Swollen. Not gonna play. What am I doing here, then?
translation.zh: 他上不了场？那我来这里干什么？

translation.en: You don't wanna talk to Coach?
translation.zh: 你不想跟教练谈谈吗？

translation.en: What's he gonna tell me?
translation.zh: 他能告诉我什么？

translation.en: There a place around here I can shoot some hoop?
translation.zh: 这附近有打篮球的地方吗？

translation.en: [in Spanish] They can't guard me.
translation.zh: 他们防不住我

translation.en: I'm guarding him.
translation.zh: 我来防守他

translation.en: I got him. Who you guarding? Nobody!
translation.zh: -我吃定他了-你觉得你能防住谁？谁都防不住！

translation.en: [man] Tie game! Next point wins!
translation.zh: 平局！谁得分谁获胜！

translation.en: [in English] Here's his chance.
translation.zh: 他的机会来了

translation.en: -[crowd groans] -Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 老天

translation.en: -What's the big guy's name? -I don't know.
translation.zh: 那个大个子叫什么？ -不知道-你不知道？

translation.en: You don't know?
translation.zh: -不知道-你不知道？

translation.en: [in Spanish] That was a bullshit foul.
translation.zh: 刚才犯规了

translation.en: Give me my money. That's my money. I won that match.
translation.zh: 把我的钱给我 -钱是我的 我赢了-钱不是你的

translation.en: -That's not your money. -Where's my money?
translation.zh: -钱是我的 我赢了-钱不是你的 我的钱呢？那是我的钱

translation.en: That's my money.
translation.zh: 我的钱呢？那是我的钱

translation.en: What do you mean your money?
translation.zh: 什么叫你的钱？

translation.en: What are you looking at?
translation.zh: 看什么看？

translation.en: -Do you know who I am? -You're a nobody.
translation.zh: 知道我是谁吗？ 你是个无名之辈

translation.en: And you are shit.
translation.zh: 你是狗屎

translation.en: -[crowd booing] -You're a clown.
translation.zh: 你是个小丑

translation.en: You big piece of shit. Fouling me all game.
translation.zh: 你这个大混蛋 不断对我犯规

translation.en: -You and me, one on one, right now. -With those boots?
translation.zh: -我们一对一单挑 就现在-穿着那双靴子？

translation.en: Twenty pavos for three shots.
translation.zh: 投三个球 赌20块

translation.en: Three shots, he'll never hit the rim.
translation.zh: 投三个球 他连篮筐都碰不到

translation.en: [man] Don't do it!
translation.zh: 别上当！

translation.en: The big dude is hustling you!
translation.zh: 那个大个子在诓你

translation.en: He's fucking scared.
translation.zh: 他害怕了

translation.en: [in English] There's one.
translation.zh: 一个

translation.en: God damn.
translation.zh: 我去

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 厉害

translation.en: Yo, yo, yo!
translation.zh: 喂！

translation.en: Shit. Shit. Shit.
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: I haven't sprinted like that in 30 years.
translation.zh: 我有30年没像这样快跑了

translation.en: Just waiting for my Achilles to pop.
translation.zh: 跟腱都快跑断了

translation.en: Just…
translation.zh: 把…

translation.en: Uno momento. I have an idea.
translation.zh: 取下来一下 我有个想法

translation.en: Are you really a construction worker, or is that all part of the hustle?
translation.zh: 你真是建筑工人吗？还是说这也是骗局的一部分？

translation.en: I mean, I couldn't take my eyes off of you.
translation.zh: 我让我看得目不转睛

translation.en: It got me so excited. You're a fantasy for a guy like me.
translation.zh: 你让我激动万分你就是我这种人的幻想

translation.en: What? Did that sound dirty or something?
translation.zh: 怎么了？是不是听起来有点下流？

translation.en: No, I didn't…
translation.zh: 不 我不是…

translation.en: I didn't mean it like that.
translation.zh: 我不是那个意思

translation.en: I meant it like you're an amazing basketball player.
translation.zh: 我是说你篮球打得很棒

translation.en: Why you follow me here, you fucking crazy?
translation.zh: 为什么跟着我？你这个神经病！

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: You understand English?
translation.zh: 你能听懂英语吗？

translation.en: I am a scout with the Sixers.
translation.zh: 我是76人队的球探

translation.en: You know the Sixers, correct? -Iverson, Barkley-- -[woman shouts in Spanish]
translation.zh: 你知道76人队吧？艾弗森、伯克利…

translation.en: She called me an old man. Yes, I am an old man.
translation.zh: 她叫我老头？ 对 我是个老头 真有趣

translation.en: Is that your daughter? I have a daughter. She's older.
translation.zh: 那是你女儿吗？我也有个女儿 她比…

translation.en: She doesn't talk to me anymore. Hang on. Hang on.
translation.zh: 她不理我了 等一下 我有个主意

translation.en: I have an idea. Por favor.
translation.zh: 等一下 我有个主意

translation.en: Let me just call… I don't know what time it is there.
translation.zh: 让我打给…不知道那边现在是几点

translation.en: I hope he's there. Please, God, be there.
translation.zh: 希望他在 老天保佑 一定要在

translation.en: -[line ringing] -Please. Please, please pick up. Pick up.
translation.zh: 拜托了 接电话

translation.en: God damn it.
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: -Uh, hello? -Hey, Schnitzel. I'm in Spain.
translation.zh: 喂？ 嘿 炸肉排！我在西班牙 我想让你见个人

translation.en: I wanted you to meet somebody.
translation.zh: 嘿 炸肉排！我在西班牙 我想让你见个人

translation.en: Dirk Nowitzki. See?
translation.zh: 德克·诺维茨基 看到了吧？

translation.en: How's it going? How's the retirement home? They still feeding you pudding?
translation.zh: 你还好吧？养老院怎么样？他们还喂你吃布丁吗？

translation.en: Who is this? How'd you get this number?
translation.zh: 你是谁？你怎么会有我的电话号码？

translation.en: [chuckles] Yes. All right. I deserved that.
translation.zh: 对 好吧 我活该

translation.en: I don't know you. But I've never seen this man before in my life.
translation.zh: 孩子 我不知道你是谁但我从没见过这个人

translation.en: He's starting to believe you, Dirk. Come on, help me out.
translation.zh: 好吧 他开始相信你的话了 德克 来吧 帮帮我

translation.en: Ah… I'm just kidding, that's Stan the man right there.
translation.zh: 我开玩笑的 那个人叫斯坦 他是个传奇

translation.en: He's a legend.
translation.zh: 那个人叫斯坦 他是个传奇

translation.en: What's your name, kid?
translation.zh: 你叫什么 孩子？

translation.en: -Bo, Bo Cruz. -Where you play at, Bo Cruz?
translation.zh: 博 博·克鲁兹 你在哪里打球 博·克鲁兹？

translation.en: Nowhere. I just work construction.
translation.zh: 我不是球员 我是建筑工人

translation.en: Not for long if Stan is calling me about you.
translation.zh: 很快就不是了因为斯坦给我打电话谈到你了

translation.en: That's right. You see, this is mi amigo, amigo.
translation.zh: 没错 看到了吧？

translation.en: Thank you so much, Dirk, and say hi to your grandmother for me.
translation.zh: 多谢了 德克 替我问候你奶奶

translation.en: My grandma died.
translation.zh: 我奶奶死了

translation.en: That's right. You told me that. My bad.
translation.zh: 没错 你跟我说过 我的错

translation.en: [Stanley] There's 450 NBA players, another 100 just waiting to get called up.
translation.zh: 总共有450名NBA球员 还有100人等着被征召

translation.en: It's my job to know every other great player in the world.
translation.zh: 我的工作是了解世上剩下的优秀球员

translation.en: I'm very good at my job. I never heard of you.
translation.zh: 我是个出色的球探但我从未听说过你

translation.en: So tell me your whole story from the top.
translation.zh: 跟我详细地从头说说你吧

translation.en: -He was a very strong baby. -Mama, no.
translation.zh: 他生下来就很健壮 妈妈 不要

translation.en: Good, I said from the top. This is nice. Go ahead.
translation.zh: 没关系 我说从头说 这样很好 继续

translation.en: A very sweet boy. When he was ten years old,
translation.zh: 非常听话 十岁那年

translation.en: was his gym coach idea to do basketball.
translation.zh: 他的体育教练决定让他练篮球

translation.en: And the club teams, they want him to play football.
translation.zh: 那些俱乐部球队 想让他踢足球

translation.en: The gym coach was smart.
translation.zh: 那个体育教练很有眼光

translation.en: Soccer is awful.
translation.zh: 足球没劲透了

translation.en: [mother] But with basketball, he played with the big kids
translation.zh: 不过说到打篮球 他小时候跟比他大的孩子一起打

translation.en: when he was still small.
translation.zh: 他小时候跟比他大的孩子一起打

translation.en: Biggest hands, though.
translation.zh: 但他的手是最大的

translation.en: They tease him. The… The movie with the little alien.
translation.zh: 他们取笑他 那部… 那部小小外星人跟一个男孩的电影

translation.en: Ehm…
translation.zh: 那部小小外星人跟一个男孩的电影

translation.en: Phone home.
translation.zh: “打电话回家”

translation.en: -E.T. -Yes. Very mean boys.
translation.zh: 《E.T.外星人》 对 那些孩子说话很损

translation.en: But also,
translation.zh: 不过话说回来

translation.en: he kind of looked like an alien.
translation.zh: 他确实有点像外星人

translation.en: -[chuckles] I bet. -He played every day.
translation.zh: 肯定的 -他每天都打球-嗯

translation.en: After his father, well,
translation.zh: 在他父亲… 嗯

translation.en: he went away. We don't have him anymore.
translation.zh: 走了以后 他离开了我们

translation.en: I'm sorry. Losing your dad at any age--
translation.zh: 我很遗憾 -在任何年纪失去父亲…-不 没有失去

translation.en: Oh, no, he's not lost. He moved to Portugal with whore.
translation.zh: -在任何年纪失去父亲…-不 没有失去 她跟一个贱女人搬去了葡萄牙

translation.en: What? It's true, she knows. After his father left…
translation.zh: 怎么了？本来就是嘛 她知道 他父亲离开后…

translation.en: My strong oak tree.
translation.zh: 我坚强的橡树

translation.en: He played basketball all his time, so he no think of him.
translation.zh: 他整天打篮球 免得想起他

translation.en: He was invited to a club team in America when he was 15,
translation.zh: 15岁那年有俱乐部邀请他去美国打球

translation.en: but before he left, Lucia's mother
translation.zh: 但出发前夕 露西娅的母亲

translation.en: got pregnant.
translation.zh: 怀孕了

translation.en: -So he stayed here for Lucia. -Right.
translation.zh: 为了露西娅 他留了下来 嗯

translation.en: I'm gonna make a couple of calls so I can see you play
translation.zh: 我打几个电话 明天我要看你和跟你水平差不多的人打球

translation.en: with some guys on your level tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天我要看你和跟你水平差不多的人打球

translation.en: I got to work.
translation.zh: 明天我要上班

translation.en: How old are you?
translation.zh: 你多少岁了？

translation.en: -Twenty-two. -Basketball years are like dog years.
translation.zh: 22岁 球员的运动生涯很短暂

translation.en: We're gonna do this, we actually got to do this now.
translation.zh: 如果要这么做 就必须马上行动

translation.en: -And how much money will you pay him? -To come to Philly?
translation.zh: 那…你们会给他多少钱？ 去费城打球吗？联赛球员的最低工资

translation.en: It'll be a prorated league minimum.
translation.zh: 去费城打球吗？联赛球员的最低工资

translation.en: But you say he was great. For great, you pay the maximum, no?
translation.zh: 但你说他很优秀优秀的球员应该拿最高工资 对吧？

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah. Yes, NBA contract of any kind is maximum, no?
translation.zh: 是的 任何NBA合约都是最高的 对吧？

translation.en: -And how much is the minimum? -Minimum salary in the NBA is $900,000.
translation.zh: 最低工资是多少？ NBA的最低工资是90万美元

translation.en: He will call in sick.
translation.zh: 明天他会请病假

translation.en: All right. I'll text you the details in the morning.
translation.zh: 好 明天早上我用短信把详情发给你

translation.en: What a pleasure.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Bo Cruz. Love the name.
translation.zh: 博·克鲁兹 我喜欢这个名字

translation.en: [coach] Doing good, Stanley? You look nervous.
translation.zh: 你还好吧 斯坦利？ -你看起来很紧张-我不是紧张 我是兴奋 教练

translation.en: I'm not nervous. I'm just very excited, Coach.
translation.zh: -你看起来很紧张-我不是紧张 我是兴奋 教练

translation.en: When is your kid coming in?
translation.zh: 那个孩子什么时候来？

translation.en: Don't know. His bus must be running late.
translation.zh: 不知道 肯定是公交车延误了

translation.en: He doesn't have a car.
translation.zh: 他没有私家车

translation.en: Right on time.
translation.zh: 很准时

translation.en: Here's my man, the Cruz Missile.
translation.zh: 我说的人来了 “科鲁兹导弹”

translation.en: -What? -What?
translation.zh: -什么？-怎么？

translation.en: You don't like that? I thought you'd love that.
translation.zh: 你不喜欢吗？我以为你会喜欢

translation.en: No? I'll keep thinking.
translation.zh: 不喜欢？好吧 我接着想

translation.en: So I want you to meet Coach Scariolo.
translation.zh: 这位是斯卡里奥洛教练

translation.en: -You know him. Spanish national team. -¿Qué tal?
translation.zh: 你认识他 西班牙国家队的

translation.en: -Hola. -Bo Cruz. Felipe. Álex.
translation.zh: 博·克鲁兹 费利佩 亚历克斯

translation.en: These guys are being nice. They're gonna let you play with 'em.
translation.zh: 这些人很好 愿意今天陪你打球

translation.en: Willy, José, Pierre. Bo Cruz.
translation.zh: 威利！乔瑟！皮埃尔！这是博·克鲁兹

translation.en: Go on down and get laced up, stretch out a little bit.
translation.zh: 去吧 换上球鞋 做做热身 我们来玩一玩

translation.en: We're going to have some fun.
translation.zh: 做做热身 我们来玩一玩

translation.en: [in Spanish] You want to try?
translation.zh: 你想试试吗？

translation.en: Willy, you're off the team.
translation.zh: 威利 你要被赶出国家队了

translation.en: [in English] Yo, get some sneakers on. Be careful.
translation.zh: 喂！换上球鞋 当心点

translation.en: -[player] He can jump. -[Stanley] Yeah, he can jump.
translation.zh: -他跳得真高-对 跳得真高

translation.en: [Stanley on speaker] You believe this? He hit 44 out of 50 from the side pocket.
translation.zh: 你能相信吗？ 他站在场外投了50个球 投中44个！

translation.en: He's incredible!
translation.zh: 他太厉害了！

translation.en: You watch the workout?
translation.zh: 你看过训练视频了吗？

translation.en: [Vin] Of course, I watched. Kid's impressive.
translation.zh: 当然看了！这孩子很厉害

translation.en: But there are other considerations.
translation.zh: 但还要考虑其他方面

translation.en: Character, mentality. Playing within a system.
translation.zh: 性格、心理素质、在体制内打球…

translation.en: I sound like you right now.
translation.zh: 现在我说话像你一样了

translation.en: Vin, this kid is the new Freak.
translation.zh: 阿文 这孩子太稀罕了

translation.en: He's a unicorn, a mythical creature.
translation.zh: 他是个独角兽 神秘生物

translation.en: The kid hasn't played organized basketball in eight years.
translation.zh: 这孩子有八年没打过有组织的比赛了

translation.en: There's a reason for that.
translation.zh: 这是有原因的

translation.en: -Let's see what he can do in the G League. -You fucking play in the G League, Blake.
translation.zh: 让他打打G联盟试试 你去打G联盟吧 布雷克！

translation.en: All right, listen to me, Vin.
translation.zh: 我…听我说 阿文

translation.en: Nobody knows about him.
translation.zh: 没人听说过他！

translation.en: You're going to see this guy, you're gonna freak the fuck out.
translation.zh: 如果你见到他 你会吓一跳的

translation.en: I promise you, you have to see him live.
translation.zh: 听我的 你一定要亲自见见他

translation.en: It's not gonna happen, Stan.
translation.zh: 这不可能 斯坦

translation.en: I'm indispensable.
translation.zh: 我不可或缺

translation.en: So valuable, right?
translation.zh: 不可多得 对吧？

translation.en: You told me if I wanted to get back on the bench to find the missing piece.
translation.zh: 你跟我说过 想回去做教练就找到那个关键球员

translation.en: Well, here I am delivering him for no money.
translation.zh: 现在我免费把他交给你

translation.en: And it's not gonna happen?
translation.zh: 你却说不可能？

translation.en: I pay you to find players, not tell me what to do with them.
translation.zh: 我是花钱请你找球员不是让你告诉我怎么使用他们

translation.en: Pay me.
translation.zh: “花钱请我？”

translation.en: You got something to say, Stan?
translation.zh: 你有话想说吗 斯坦？

translation.en: [Bo] I don't understand.
translation.zh: 我不明白

translation.en: [Stanley] It's all good. It's just they don't have a roster spot at the moment,
translation.zh: 没事 他们只是暂时没有名额

translation.en: but they love what they saw and want to see more.
translation.zh: 但他们很满意你的表现他们想看你继续表现

translation.en: And let's just say a spot doesn't open up,
translation.zh: 现在暂时没有名额

translation.en: we'll get your name in the draft.
translation.zh: 我们会把你放入选秀名单

translation.en: So you play like you did yesterday, at the combine, you'll be a lock.
translation.zh: 你在联合选秀时像昨天那样表现就行了 肯定能行

translation.en: They still pay me to come.
translation.zh: 他们还是会付我钱吧？

translation.en: They'll pay you for sure.
translation.zh: 他们会付你钱的 放心吧

translation.en: It might not come at once, but you'll get the money.
translation.zh: 也许不会马上给钱 但你会拿到钱的

translation.en: -I promise you. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我向你保证-好吧

translation.en: Giant body like yours on an eight-hour flight is gonna be rough.
translation.zh: 你身材魁梧坐八个小时的飞机会很辛苦

translation.en: You'll take my seat, okay?
translation.zh: 你坐我的座位 好吗？

translation.en: -Oh, really? -Okay. Yeah, no problem.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-真的 没问题

translation.en: [on PA] This is your captain speaking.
translation.zh: 我是机长

translation.en: I'd like to welcome everyone aboard Flight 718. We're currently cruising at…
translation.zh: 欢迎各位搭乘718号航班 我们正以一万米的高度巡航

translation.en: [whispering] Psst, Stanley. Stanley. Here.
translation.zh: 斯坦利

translation.en: Look what I got.
translation.zh: -嗯？-你看这是什么

translation.en: -[Stanley] Oh, yes. -They are warm.
translation.zh: 哦 对 还是热的

translation.en: -That's good. -You want some?
translation.zh: 很好 你要吗？

translation.en: Uh… I don't want to start a riot back here. It's cool, thanks.
translation.zh: 嗯…我不想引起众怒 不用了 谢谢

translation.en: -One bite? -No, I'm trying not to, badly.
translation.zh: -咬一口吧-不用了 我… 我在尽力忍着 很辛苦

translation.en: -It's really good. -Just give me a fucking roll. Thank you.
translation.zh: 真的很好吃 给我个面包卷就行了 谢谢

translation.en: [man] Next, please.
translation.zh: （美国海关与边境保护局） 下一位

translation.en: [officer] Sir, I need you to come with me.
translation.zh: 先生 请跟我来

translation.en: Oh, hey, that's my kid.
translation.zh: 嘿！他是我的人

translation.en: Yo, excuse me. No, no, he's with me. He's with me.
translation.zh: 喂！ 听我说！不要！ 他跟我一起的

translation.en: What's up, Oscar? What happened?
translation.zh: 怎么了 奥斯卡？怎么回事？

translation.en: He got flagged for an aggravated assault charge.
translation.zh: 他受过严重伤人指控

translation.en: Beat up a guy pretty bad five years ago.
translation.zh: 五年前将一个人打成重伤

translation.en: -Ah, Jesus. -He needs to be very careful.
translation.zh: 老天 他必须非常小心

translation.en: He goes in front of a judge for even running a stop sign,
translation.zh: 一旦犯了任何事上了法庭哪怕只是闯红灯

translation.en: he can get his visa permanently revoked.
translation.zh: 他的签证将被永久撤销

translation.en: Right. Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Are you looking at him for the draft?
translation.zh: 他会参加选秀吗？

translation.en: Yeah. We're all very excited about him. This is something I should have caught.
translation.zh: 是的 我们非常看好他 但我应该早点发现的

translation.en: I don't want the team paying for my mistake.
translation.zh: 我不想让球队为我的错误买单

translation.en: So keep this between us. I'll cover your hours.
translation.zh: 所以…这件事别说出去 -我会给你报酬的-行 没问题

translation.en: No problem. Just bring us back home a championship, right?
translation.zh: -我会给你报酬的-行 没问题 为我们拿个冠军回来

translation.en: -Will do, Oscar. -Good. Thank you.
translation.zh: 好的 奥斯卡 谢谢

translation.en: Anything else you need to tell me? Now is the time.
translation.zh: 还有什么要告诉我的 现在就说

translation.en: We all have stuff from our past,
translation.zh: 我们都犯过错

translation.en: but having a criminal record's a pretty big detail to leave out.
translation.zh: 我们都犯过错 但犯罪记录是大事 你不该瞒着我

translation.en: [sighs] No more secrets from now on, all right?
translation.zh: 以后别再有事瞒着我了 好吗？

translation.en: No big deal, moving on.
translation.zh: 没事的 别想了

translation.en: I got you this,
translation.zh: 我给你买了这个

translation.en: for local and international calls.
translation.zh: 可以拨打本地电话和国际长途

translation.en: You can talk to your daughter anytime.
translation.zh: 你随时可以打给你女儿

translation.en: -Thanks, Stanley. -Philadelphia, baby.
translation.zh: 谢了 斯坦利 你会喜欢费城的

translation.en: You're gonna love it. Best sports fans in the world.
translation.zh: 你会喜欢费城的 这里有全世界最棒的球迷

translation.en: Actually the worst, but that's what makes 'em the best.
translation.zh: 其实是最差劲的但正因为如此 他们是最棒的

translation.en: [Teresa] He's at that hotel all by himself?
translation.zh: -他一个人住在酒店？-是的

translation.en: [Stanley] Yeah. He wanted to call his daughter.
translation.zh: -他一个人住在酒店？-是的 他想给他女儿打电话我给了他一些钱 让他安顿下来

translation.en: I gave him money. He's settling in.
translation.zh: 他想给他女儿打电话我给了他一些钱 让他安顿下来

translation.en: So when are you taking this, what's his name again?
translation.zh: 好吧 那你什么时候带这个…他叫什么名字来着？

translation.en: Bo Cruz.
translation.zh: 博·克鲁兹

translation.en: When are you taking Bo across the river to train with the team?
translation.zh: 博·克鲁兹 你什么时候带阿博过河跟球队一起训练？

translation.en: I don't know if I want to give them this guy yet.
translation.zh: 我还没决定要不要把这个人交给他

translation.en: Just wanna make sure I do what's right for the kid.
translation.zh: 我只想为这个孩子着想

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 干嘛？

translation.en: The Sixers don't know you stashed him.
translation.zh: 76人队不知道你把他藏起来了

translation.en: You don't get it. The kid is like if Scottie Pippen and a wolf had a baby.
translation.zh: 你不知道 这孩子就像是 斯科蒂·皮蓬跟一头狼生的孩子

translation.en: So what are you saying? He has a hairy face.
translation.zh: 你什么意思？他脸上长满了毛吗？

translation.en: I'm saying if this kid puts it together,
translation.zh: 我是说如果这孩子肯努力

translation.en: when he puts it together, he will be top ten in the league.
translation.zh: 我是说如果这孩子肯努力 他会成为联盟的十佳球员

translation.en: And being the guy who finds the guy matters in this business.
translation.zh: 而我是识千里马的伯乐

translation.en: -Won't Vince fire you for this? -T…
translation.zh: 你就不怕文斯开除你吗？ 阿特

translation.en: The kid is… special.
translation.zh: 这孩子… 很特别

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: With the cheese or with the whole thing?
translation.zh: 你是说芝士还是整件事？

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: You should have stopped me again. This is fucking atrocious.
translation.zh: 你应该拦着我的 太难吃了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: You're looking for the big man? He ain't here.
translation.zh: 你在找那个大个子？他不在

translation.en: -Where is he? -Make a right on 13th.
translation.zh: 他去哪儿了？ 13号街右转

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 嘿！你在干什么？

translation.en: -[crowd exclaims] -Careful, please.
translation.zh: 拜托你当心点！

translation.en: All right, that's it. That's it.
translation.zh: 好了！够了！

translation.en: Take your money. Goodness.
translation.zh: 拿上你的钱 老天

translation.en: I see. We're not here to hustle, man.
translation.zh: 我看到了 我们不是来骗钱的 伙计

translation.en: Why not?
translation.zh: 干嘛不骗？

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Good Lord.
translation.zh: 老天

translation.en: -Why? -[Bo] Hey, Stanley.
translation.zh: -为什么？-嘿 斯坦利

translation.en: Have you ever tried these Ishkabibble's? Oh, my God. [sniffs]
translation.zh: 你试过这个吗？奶酪牛排 太好吃了

translation.en: Yeah, but you got five cheese steaks.
translation.zh: 嗯 但你买了五份奶酪牛排

translation.en: [Bo] Yeah, but each one is different.
translation.zh: 对 但每份都不一样

translation.en: [Stanley] But you only took one bite of each one.
translation.zh: 但你每种只吃了一口

translation.en: You take one bite and you don't eat it all, because if not, you get fat.
translation.zh: 对 吃一口就够了 吃多了会长胖

translation.en: Why did you look at me when you said that?
translation.zh: 你干嘛看着我说这话？

translation.en: -Come on, Stanley, I don't say that. -Okay.
translation.zh: -得了吧 斯坦利 我没那么说-好吧

translation.en: What the fuck did you do to the minibar?
translation.zh: 你把迷你吧怎么了？

translation.en: [Bo] Sixers are paying, don't worry.
translation.zh: 反正是76人队付钱 别担心

translation.en: Yes, but we don't eat $9 Pringles. A man must have a code.
translation.zh: 是的 但你…我们不会吃九美元的品客薯片 做人要讲规矩

translation.en: I literally eat one chip. They are not that good.
translation.zh: 我只吃了一片 不怎么好吃

translation.en: It's still $9. They don't charge you per chip.
translation.zh: 那也花了九美元！又不是按片卖

translation.en: Okay. Anyways, I got some good news.
translation.zh: 好吧 总之 我有一些好消息

translation.en: -Um, an old friend, Leon Rich… -Leon Rich who played for Timberwolves?
translation.zh: -我的老朋友利昂·里奇-森林狼那个？

translation.en: Right. We played together in college.
translation.zh: 是的 我们读大学时曾一起打球

translation.en: He's a power agent now, and he's in Philly with a few of his guys for an open run.
translation.zh: 现在他是个经纪人 他陪几个人来费城参加一场比赛

translation.en: Like, who are these guys?
translation.zh: -什么人？-几个大学生

translation.en: College kids. NBA prospects getting ready for the draft.
translation.zh: -什么人？-几个大学生 他们有望进入NBA 在为选秀做准备

translation.en: It's a scrimmage, but it gets serious out there.
translation.zh: 是场练习赛 但会很认真

translation.en: So it's like a real tryout?
translation.zh: 是一场真正的选拔赛？

translation.en: No, no, no.
translation.zh: 不 只是展示实力

translation.en: It's just a showcase, not a big deal, just a step in the process.
translation.zh: 不 只是展示实力 没什么大不了 只是例行程序

translation.en: The whole idea is to give young bucks a place to shine.
translation.zh: 就是给年轻球员一个发光的机会

translation.en: So you're just gonna go out there, and you're gonna shine, Bo Cruz.
translation.zh: 所以你要去那里发光 博·克鲁兹

translation.en: Okay, let's go.
translation.zh: 好 走吧

translation.en: ♪ What you want now? I'm the one now ♪
translation.zh: （主队 客队）

translation.en: [Vin] Stanley.
translation.zh: 斯坦利！

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 嘿 过来

translation.en: -Hey, Matisse, Kyle. -'Sup?
translation.zh: 嘿 马蒂斯 -凯尔-你好

translation.en: Bo. This is Vin Merrick. He's co-owner of the Sixers,
translation.zh: 阿博 这是文·梅里克 他是76人队的共同所有人但球队基本上是他在管

translation.en: but he basically runs the team.
translation.zh: 他是76人队的共同所有人但球队基本上是他在管

translation.en: And Leon Rich, basically, he runs the world.
translation.zh: 这是利昂·里奇 基本上管着全世界

translation.en: The Double Deuce told me a lot about you, man.
translation.zh: 22号跟我说了很多你的事 伙计

translation.en: [Vin] Oh, yeah, Bo Cruz.
translation.zh: 对 博·克鲁兹 我们久闻你的大名了

translation.en: We certainly have heard a lot about you from Stanley, and Oscar Morales.
translation.zh: 对 博·克鲁兹 我们久闻你的大名了 当然 都是听斯坦利说的 这是我们的律师奥斯卡·莫拉莱斯他去机场接的你

translation.en: Our in-house counsel, he met you at the airport.
translation.zh: 这是我们的律师奥斯卡·莫拉莱斯他去机场接的你

translation.en: Yeah, they met. Go get laced up, bud.
translation.zh: 对 他们见过 去换球鞋 伙计

translation.en: -Huge fan. -Thanks, man.
translation.zh: -我是你的超级粉丝-谢谢

translation.en: -How you know he's talking about you? -Come on.
translation.zh: -你怎么知道他在说你？-得了吧 兄弟

translation.en: Sorry, but I had to bring him.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我必须带他来 我…

translation.en: You're going to see why after you watch the kid play.
translation.zh: 等你看过他打球 你就明白原因了

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: Appreciate it.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Fellas.
translation.zh: 伙计们

translation.en: What is Kermit Wilts doing here? The guy's a lock at two.
translation.zh: 克米特·威尔茨来干什么？他不是第二轮人选吗？

translation.en: He thinks he should be number one.
translation.zh: 他觉得自己应该是第一轮人选

translation.en: [Stanley] He can shoot from anywhere. Just stay with him wherever he goes.
translation.zh: 他在任何位置都能投篮 你要盯死他

translation.en: Don't let him score in bunches. Don't let him get hot. Okay?
translation.zh: 别让他大量得分别让他兴奋起来 懂吗？

translation.en: He's here to show off. Use that. Get physical with him.
translation.zh: 他是来炫耀技术的利用这一点 对他贴身防守

translation.en: You give Kermit Wilts the business, your whole world's going to change overnight.
translation.zh: 如果你能防住克米特·威尔茨你的人生将在一夜之间改变

translation.en: You got this shit, go get it.
translation.zh: 你能行的 去吧

translation.en: Best of luck out there, man.
translation.zh: 祝你好运 伙计

translation.en: -What's your name? -Bo.
translation.zh: -你叫什么名字？-阿博

translation.en: Bo. I like that. Strong, strong like a bull.
translation.zh: “阿博” 我喜欢 像阿博一样强壮

translation.en: Let's give these people a show. What do you say, Bo?
translation.zh: 我们让他们看场好戏吧 阿博

translation.en: So, where are you from?
translation.zh: 你是哪里人？

translation.en: Spain.
translation.zh: 西班牙

translation.en: Shit sounds wack.
translation.zh: 听起来很烂

translation.en: Y'all like bull fights over there, right?
translation.zh: 你们西班牙人喜欢斗牛 对吧？

translation.en: So, here's what's going to happen. You're the bull.
translation.zh: 接下来会这样 你是牛 我是身披斗篷的斗牛士

translation.en: I'm the motherfucker with a cape running your big dumb ass in circles. That's cool.
translation.zh: 你是牛 我是身披斗篷的斗牛士 让你这个傻大个不停地兜圈 那很酷

translation.en: Let's get it.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Get up on him, baby.
translation.zh: 紧逼他 宝贝

translation.en: Stay with him.
translation.zh: 跟着他

translation.en: We're good.
translation.zh: 我们打得不错！

translation.en: Right here.
translation.zh: 嘿 这里

translation.en: Go ahead, make something happen.
translation.zh: 来吧 搞点动静

translation.en: That's it. Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 很好 好样的！

translation.en: -Who's this? -Stan brought him.
translation.zh: -这是谁？-斯坦带来的

translation.en: [Stanley] Nice vision.
translation.zh: 视野不错

translation.en: Welcome to America.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到美国！

translation.en: -Hey, hey. -[players speaking indistinctly]
translation.zh: -嘿 把球给我-嘿！ -让开-嘿 伙计 我没事 不用帮忙

translation.en: I don't need no help.
translation.zh: -让开-嘿 伙计 我没事 不用帮忙

translation.en: That's it. Nice.
translation.zh: 好样的！很好！

translation.en: I like-- I like him. I like him.
translation.zh: 我喜欢他

translation.en: This is gonna be good.
translation.zh: -这下有好戏看了 他们两个-嗯

translation.en: He's got a lot of length. Does he have any control?
translation.zh: 他个子很高 控球能力怎么样？

translation.en: -Yeah! -[Stanley] Nice swat! Way to get after it.
translation.zh: 漂亮 就要这样紧追不舍

translation.en: Good D.
translation.zh: 防得不错

translation.en: Finna hit you with a hazy, cross sidestep.
translation.zh: 我要打得你晕头转向

translation.en: Think you can stop me?
translation.zh: 你能阻止我吗？

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: Stan's kid getting a lesson here.
translation.zh: 斯坦带来的人尝到教训了

translation.en: You're good. Don't come over here.
translation.zh: 继续 别过来

translation.en: -Shit. -He's like a giraffe on roller skates.
translation.zh: 他像一只穿着溜冰鞋的长颈鹿

translation.en: Shake that off. Shake it off.
translation.zh: 别放在心上

translation.en: You get it, right?
translation.zh: 接球 迈克

translation.en: Step back three. Really can't guard me, bro.
translation.zh: 后退 你防不住我的

translation.en: Damn, you slow.
translation.zh: 见鬼 你太慢了

translation.en: -Hey, let's take a seat for a minute. -No.
translation.zh: -嘿 过来坐一会儿-不

translation.en: Just give yourself a breather.
translation.zh: 让自己休息一下

translation.en: [Kermit] Listen to him. Listen to your daddy.
translation.zh: 嘿 听他的！听你老爸的话！

translation.en: Here comes a brick.
translation.zh: 投不中！

translation.en: Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: You can see it's getting to his head.
translation.zh: 他情绪受到影响了

translation.en: -Oh! It's okay. -I think the game's too fast for him.
translation.zh: 他适应不了这种快节奏

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: 他根本就不会打

translation.en: Move out the way. All right, kid.
translation.zh: -没人传球给他-好了 孩子

translation.en: Olé, bitch!
translation.zh: 嘿 贱人

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: He had his moments. I saw it.
translation.zh: 他有一段打得不错 我看到了

translation.en: That wasn't him. That wasn't even close to him.
translation.zh: 那不是他的水平他完全没有发挥出来

translation.en: [sighs] It's my fault. I rushed this whole thing.
translation.zh: 都怪我 我太心急了

translation.en: Remember our freshman year, we were playing at Gonzaga,
translation.zh: 还记得我们读大一的时候跟贡萨加大学队的比赛吗？

translation.en: they put John Stockton on me?
translation.zh: 他们让我防守约翰·斯托克顿你让我当心他

translation.en: You said watch out for this guy. I said nobody looking like
translation.zh: 他们让我防守约翰·斯托克顿你让我当心他 我说：“一个长得像卖保险的家伙不可能突破我的防守”

translation.en: an insurance salesman going to bust my ass.
translation.zh: 我说：“一个长得像卖保险的家伙不可能突破我的防守”

translation.en: Midway through the second half, 20 points, 20 assists.
translation.zh: 下半场打到一半的时候 他得了20分 20次助攻你们都不肯看我 还记得吗？

translation.en: -None of y'all would look at me. Remember? -I remember.
translation.zh: 他得了20分 20次助攻你们都不肯看我 还记得吗？ 当然记得

translation.en: Remember me playing like that again?
translation.zh: 我后来还打得那么差劲过吗？

translation.en: No, 'cause I never wanted to feel that feeling again.
translation.zh: 没有 因为我不想再尝到那种滋味

translation.en: So tonight's a good thing.
translation.zh: 所以今晚的事是好事

translation.en: Nothing was good about tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚没有好事 相信我

translation.en: That was some awful… [laughing]
translation.zh: …那孩子表现太糟糕了

translation.en: -Wanna grab some din-din? -I got to catch a plane.
translation.zh: -想去吃晚饭吗？-我要赶飞机

translation.en: You're gonna have to pick up the tab on the Spanish kid. I'm not interested.
translation.zh: 那个西班牙孩子的费用由你出斯坦 我对他没兴趣

translation.en: Time to get back out there and keep looking.
translation.zh: 我想你该出去继续找了

translation.en: You're gonna miss another one of your daughter's birthdays.
translation.zh: 很遗憾 你又要错过你女儿的生日了

translation.en: The Sixers will send something nice for her.
translation.zh: 不过球队会送她生日礼物的

translation.en: Hey, I never asked you to pick up the tab on him, Vincent.
translation.zh: 嘿 我没说过让你承担他的费用 文森特

translation.en: Frankly, I'm not interested
translation.zh: 坦白说 我没兴趣为一个自以为是的

translation.en: in working for a smug, born-on-third fucking bitch.
translation.zh: 坦白说 我没兴趣为一个自以为是的 富二代贱人打工

translation.en: So how's this?
translation.zh: 不如这样

translation.en: Kiss my fat ass, and fuck your five-star hotels.
translation.zh: 给我舔屁股让你的五星级酒店见鬼去吧

translation.en: I quit.
translation.zh: 我不干了

translation.en: So Stanley's not coming to dinner?
translation.zh: 斯坦利不来吃晚饭了？

translation.en: -I really wish he was now. -[laughter]
translation.zh: 我倒希望他来

translation.en: [Blake] Stanley knows how to fuck up his life.
translation.zh: 斯坦利很会自毁前途 对吧？

translation.en: Another bad decision in the books.
translation.zh: 又做了一个错误的决定

translation.en: The combine's in six weeks.
translation.zh: 还有六个礼拜就是联合选秀了

translation.en: Can you get my guy in?
translation.zh: 你能把我的人塞进名单吗？

translation.en: I'll work on it.
translation.zh: 我会想办法的

translation.en: Don't have a heart attack, man. Come on, 22.
translation.zh: 不要气到心脏病发作 走吧 22号

translation.en: I fly home tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我明天坐飞机回家？

translation.en: Is that what you want to do?
translation.zh: 你想飞回家吗？

translation.en: You come all this way, have one bad day, and you're ready to back down?
translation.zh: 你大老远来了受了一点挫折 就想打退堂鼓？

translation.en: -No, but I suck. -Do you love this game?
translation.zh: 不是 但我太差劲了 你热爱篮球吗？

translation.en: Love it with your whole heart?
translation.zh: 我是说发自肺腑地热爱

translation.en: Because if you don't, let's not even bother.
translation.zh: 如果你不热爱 我们就别费劲了

translation.en: Let's not open that door. They're gonna slam it right in our face.
translation.zh: 我们就别试了 免得被他们羞辱

translation.en: I love this game. I live this game.
translation.zh: 我热爱篮球 篮球就是我的生命

translation.en: And there's 1,000 other guys waiting in the wings who are obsessed with this game.
translation.zh: 还有一千个痴迷篮球的人等着想加入

translation.en: Obsession is gonna beat talent every time.
translation.zh: 痴迷永远比天分更管用

translation.en: You've got all the talent in the world, but are you obsessed?
translation.zh: 你很有天分 但你痴迷吗？

translation.en: Is it all you ever think about?
translation.zh: 这就是你一直在想的吗？

translation.en: Let's face it, it's you against you out there.
translation.zh: 面对现实吧 你的对手是你自己

translation.en: When you walk on that court, you have to think, "I am the best guy out there."
translation.zh: 上了球场 你必须认为自己是最优秀的

translation.en: "I don't care if LeBron's playing."
translation.zh: 不管勒布朗是否在场上

translation.en: So let me ask you again. Do you love this game?
translation.zh: 所以我再问你一次 你热爱篮球吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Is there a newborn kitten purring in here right now?
translation.zh: 你是刚出生的小猫在喵喵叫吗？

translation.en: I couldn't hear you.
translation.zh: 我听不见

translation.en: -[shouts] Do you want to be in the NBA? -Yes!
translation.zh: 你想打NBA吗？ 想！

translation.en: Let's make that happen.
translation.zh: 那我们就去实现这个目标

translation.en: Never back down.
translation.zh: 永不退缩

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: [Stanley] Buenos días, Bo Cruz. I'm out front.
translation.zh: 早上好 博·克鲁兹 我在大门外

translation.en: Stanley, it's 4:10, man.
translation.zh: 斯坦利 现在是4点10分

translation.en: [Stanley] Come on downstairs. Bring your shit.
translation.zh: 快点下来 带上你的东西

translation.en: Kobe used to get up at 4:00 a.m. so he could practice before practice.
translation.zh: 以前科比是凌晨4点起床赶在开始训练前进行训练

translation.en: I got you a gift.
translation.zh: 我给你买了一个礼物

translation.en: -Kobes. -That's right, for inspiration.
translation.zh: 科比代言的 没错 为了激励你

translation.en: -Let's get to work. -[engine starts]
translation.zh: 我们开工吧

translation.en: The combine's in a month and a half.
translation.zh: 距离联合选秀还有一个半月那场比赛会电视直播

translation.en: It's a televised game, so the whole world's gonna get to see you play.
translation.zh: 距离联合选秀还有一个半月那场比赛会电视直播 全世界的人都会看你打球

translation.en: We got to get you ready.
translation.zh: 我们得让你做好准备

translation.en: So you see this hill?
translation.zh: 看到这座山了吗？

translation.en: Average professional biker can get to the top of this hill in two minutes.
translation.zh: 一般的职业单车选手 能在两分钟内到达山顶

translation.en: We're gonna come out here every morning till you get the top, running, minute-45.
translation.zh: 我们每天早上都会来直到你能在1分45秒内跑上山顶

translation.en: -Shit. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -见鬼-对

translation.en: And three, two, one.
translation.zh: 三、二、一

translation.en: -[car horn beeps] -Let's go. Move it, kid. Yup.
translation.zh: 出发 快点 孩子 对

translation.en: Looking good.
translation.zh: 不错

translation.en: That's it, man. That's it. I like it.
translation.zh: 就这样 很好 不错 跑起来！

translation.en: Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 不错 跑起来！

translation.en: Pump it.
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: Pump those arms.
translation.zh: 手臂摆起来！

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. What are you doing? Don't stop. To the top.
translation.zh: 你干什么？别停 跑到山顶

translation.en: Oh, we're going to be here a lot, bud. Let's go!
translation.zh: 我们会经常来的 快点跑！

translation.en: Keep going, come on. Find it in you.
translation.zh: 继续跑！快点！拿出干劲来！

translation.en: You got to push it, bro. I'm telling you, I'm gonna hit your heels.
translation.zh: 你得加把劲 兄弟告诉你 我会撞你的

translation.en: Oh, my goodness gracious.
translation.zh: 老天

translation.en: -[coughing] -Okay. All right, so that's time.
translation.zh: 好吧 时间出来了

translation.en: I had no idea this stopwatch went that high.
translation.zh: 没想到会用这么长时间

translation.en: I'm not shitting you.
translation.zh: 不开玩笑

translation.en: When we were teaching my daughter to walk, she got up this hill faster than you.
translation.zh: 我们教女儿走路时她爬这座山的速度都比你快

translation.en: Just get in the car.
translation.zh: 上车吧

translation.en: Whew. We've got a lot of work to do, baby.
translation.zh: 我们有很多工作要做 宝贝

translation.en: Ah, you're getting sweat in my Malibu.
translation.zh: 你会搞得我车里全是汗

translation.en: -[Bo sighs tiredly] -[laughs] Oh, all right.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Bo.
translation.zh: 阿博！

translation.en: Hi. This is my daughter, Alex.
translation.zh: 嗨 伙计 这是我女儿亚历克斯亚历克斯 这是阿博

translation.en: -This is Bo. -Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 这是我女儿亚历克斯亚历克斯 这是阿博 嗨 幸会

translation.en: -Hi. -She's going to be shooting us today.
translation.zh: -嗨-今天她将为我们拍视频

translation.en: Are you ready, kid?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗 孩子？

translation.en: -Alex. -Yes.
translation.zh: 亚历克斯

translation.en: All right. All right. I've never seen her like that.
translation.zh: -是的-好 我从没见过她这样 有意思

translation.en: That was funny.
translation.zh: 我从没见过她这样 有意思

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Get this. Alex, get this round. Initiate contact.
translation.zh: 拍下来 亚历克斯 拍他带球上篮

translation.en: Don't get jammed. Get past that.
translation.zh: 开始身体接触！别被堵住 冲过去！

translation.en: Drive. Use your legs. Downhill. Down. Finish--
translation.zh: 带球！腿动起来 快攻…完成扣篮

translation.en: -[grunting] -Come on. All right.
translation.zh: 来吧 伙计 没事

translation.en: Your first year in the league, no calls.
translation.zh: 进入联盟的第一年裁判是不会吹对方犯规的

translation.en: You need a hand up? Get out of here. Don't look so sad.
translation.zh: 需要拉一把吗？起来 别一脸沮丧

translation.en: Go ahead. Zoom in on that sad face of his right now.
translation.zh: 来 给他沮丧的表情一个特写

translation.en: I want you to finish through it. Let's go.
translation.zh: 我要你完成进攻 来吧

translation.en: All right, shoulders down, that's right. Go!
translation.zh: 好 放低肩膀 对 上…

translation.en: Okay. All right.
translation.zh: 好 不错 你抗住了身体接触

translation.en: You absorbed the contact. I need you to finish through the contact.
translation.zh: 好 不错 你抗住了身体接触 我要你通过身体接触完成投篮 好吗？

translation.en: Alex, you get that? Okay, we're getting there. Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 亚历克斯 拍下来了吗？ 好 有戏 上 切入

translation.en: Cut. Move. Go downhill! All the way, now finish it.
translation.zh: 动起来 冲过去 快攻 完成投篮

translation.en: Oh! That's how you take it to the rim.
translation.zh: 就是这样带球上篮

translation.en: What happened? Were you on me? Always on the money, sweetheart.
