translation.zh: 什么都影响不了这个年轻人 我喜欢 嘿 很好

translation.en: -I'm gonna catch those feet! -[horn honks]
translation.zh: 我要撞上你的脚了！

translation.en: Oh, look how scared he is!
translation.zh: 他吓死了！

translation.en: [trainer] No stopping. Got nothing for you.
translation.zh: 别停 没东西给你

translation.en: That's what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 这就对了

translation.en: [Stanley] Yes, sir! Yes, sir! Yes, sir!
translation.zh: 好样的！

translation.en: You know how much I love that. Hard work, baby.
translation.zh: 你知道我有多喜欢这样 勤奋工作 宝贝

translation.en: I knew when I saw you. That's a hardworking fool.
translation.zh: 勤奋工作 宝贝 我第一眼见到你就知道你是个勤奋的笨蛋

translation.en: -You're going somewhere. -[Bo] We're going together.
translation.zh: 你会有成就的 我们一起成就-我们一起成就

translation.en: [Stanley] We're going together. Whoo!
translation.zh: 我们一起成就-我们一起成就

translation.en: Okay, good. Look around. Who's open? Be patient. Now! Attack! Go! Go! Go!
translation.zh: 好的 看看四周 谁没人防守？耐心点 出手！进攻！ 上！好的 撤退 对 很好

translation.en: Okay, retreat. Yeah, that's good, man. That's it. Wait.
translation.zh: 上！好的 撤退 对 很好 很好 等等 你会找到时机的你会冲到篮下的

translation.en: You'll find times you go down there, and nothing's open, wait, you'll find it.
translation.zh: 很好 等等 你会找到时机的你会冲到篮下的 不过先等等 你会找到时机的

translation.en: You're hot, baby! You're hot.
translation.zh: 你很帅 宝贝！你很帅

translation.en: Bo Cruz coming down!
translation.zh: 博·克鲁兹来了！

translation.en: -Low, yeah-- -Gotta make passes under pressure.
translation.zh: 低点 对… 要能在压力下传球 很好！

translation.en: That's it! Okay, nice. We're cooking. Last one.
translation.zh: 要能在压力下传球 很好！ 好 不错 漂亮 最后一个

translation.en: Push it! Get into the next gear! Go! Go! Go!
translation.zh: 加油！加速！ 快！

translation.en: Jimmy Butler's up on you. Now what? Now what?
translation.zh: 吉米·巴特勒在防守你 怎么办？

translation.en: We're doing this 'cause nobody else is doing this. Come on! Whoo!
translation.zh: 我们这样做是因为没人这样做 来吧！

translation.en: That's it. Back. Pass.
translation.zh: -很好 后退 传球-加油 阿博

translation.en: Let's go, Bo. Finish that. Come on now, Bo!
translation.zh: -很好 后退 传球-加油 阿博 -完成那个 来吧 阿博！-很好 传球！好样的 阿博！

translation.en: Good, Bo! Yeah, Bo! Use that clock! Use that clock!
translation.zh: -完成那个 来吧 阿博！-很好 传球！好样的 阿博！ 用那个钟！找一个投篮手！

translation.en: Find a shooter! That's it! Hit that!
translation.zh: 用那个钟！找一个投篮手！ 很好！投篮！

translation.en: You're ahead, baby! Now!
translation.zh: 我们领先了 宝贝！冲刺！

translation.en: On your right! Kick his ass!
translation.zh: 在你右边！战胜他！

translation.en: Leave him in the dust! That's right!
translation.zh: 让他吃灰去吧！很好！

translation.en: Drive! Drive! Drive! Drive! Drive!
translation.zh: 让他吃灰去吧！很好！ 冲啊！

translation.en: Yeah! Yeah, suck it, baby!
translation.zh: 耶！去死吧 宝贝！

translation.en: Go! You're gonna get this! You're gonna get this!
translation.zh: 加油！你要成功了！

translation.en: That's it, brother! Yes, sir!
translation.zh: 很好 兄弟！好样的！

translation.en: Minute forty-four with room to spare, baby! Yes!
translation.zh: 1分44秒 比目标还要快！好样的！

translation.en: The Cruz Missile!
translation.zh: 科鲁兹导弹！

translation.en: You know you like that!
translation.zh: 你知道你喜欢这个绰号！

translation.en: Look at him go!
translation.zh: 他冲了！

translation.en: That a baby!
translation.zh: 好样的！

translation.en: [Bo] Stanley!
translation.zh: 斯坦利！

translation.en: We did it!
translation.zh: 我们成功了！

translation.en: [Stanley] Yeah! Rocky!
translation.zh: 耶！洛奇！

translation.en: -[Bo] Yeah! -[Stanley] Love it!
translation.zh: -对！-太好了！

translation.en: [Stanley] For God's sake, get the kid more butter.
translation.zh: （他已经准备好干翻他们了！） 看在老天的份上 多给他一点黄油

translation.en: I mean, it's almost the whole stick of butter.
translation.zh: 已经几乎是一整条黄油了

translation.en: -[laughing] -Hey.
translation.zh: 已经几乎是一整条黄油了 嘿

translation.en: What do you think of the Cruz Missile as a nickname for--
translation.zh: 你觉得科鲁兹导弹这个绰号怎么样…

translation.en: -The Cruz-- -He doesn't like it.
translation.zh: 科鲁兹导…

translation.en: That nickname is stupid.
translation.zh: -他不喜欢-这个绰号太难听了

translation.en: -He says it's stupid. -[laughter]
translation.zh: 他嫌难听

translation.en: [Teresa] Don't be rude.
translation.zh: 别这么没礼貌

translation.en: -So, do you have any pictures of Lucia? -I miss her so much.
translation.zh: 你有露西娅的照片吗？ 我很想她

translation.en: She has your eyes.
translation.zh: 她的眼睛很像你

translation.en: Yeah. She does. They're beautiful.
translation.zh: 没错 很像 很漂亮

translation.en: Easy, tiger.
translation.zh: 矜持点 小老虎

translation.en: -[all chuckle] -No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: So, have you ever been away from her this long?
translation.zh: 你跟她分开过这么久吗？

translation.en: -I've never been away from her. -Never? Oh, my goodness.
translation.zh: 我跟她从没分开过 从未分开过 老天

translation.en: So, anyway, Mrs. Sugerman, tell me how you met this guy.
translation.zh: 苏格曼太太 你跟他是怎么认识的？

translation.en: -"How'd she become so lucky?" He's asking. -Okay. All right. Story time.
translation.zh: -他是问你怎么这么好运-好吧 讲故事时间

translation.en: So, I was on the women's track team, and we had a meet at Virginia Tech,
translation.zh: 当时我是女子田径队的 我们去弗吉尼亚理工学院参加比赛

translation.en: and it was the same time that the men's basketball team had a game.
translation.zh: 正好男子篮球队也有一场比赛

translation.en: And, unfortunately for us, our bus broke down. So…
translation.zh: 很不幸 我们的巴士抛锚了

translation.en: Mm-hmm. I paid the bus driver.
translation.zh: -所以…-我贿赂了巴士司机

translation.en: We had to bum a ride home with those fools.
translation.zh: 我们只能搭那些笨蛋的车回家

translation.en: Stanley sat next to me for three hours, the entire ride home,
translation.zh: 斯坦利在我旁边坐了三个小时 全程一句话都没对我说

translation.en: and he didn't say one word.
translation.zh: 全程一句话都没对我说

translation.en: I didn't think she wanted to talk to me. I was scared.
translation.zh: 我以为她不想跟我说话 我很害怕

translation.en: And then, as everybody is walking off,
translation.zh: 然后当大家下车时 他突然大声说

translation.en: he just says crazy loud, "One day, I'm gonna marry you,
translation.zh: 然后当大家下车时 他突然大声说 “有一天 我要娶你

translation.en: and we're gonna have very athletic children!"
translation.zh: 我们将生一堆非常有运动细胞的孩子！”

translation.en: -I'm like, "What?" -You really say that?
translation.zh: -我心想“啥？”-你真的那样说了？

translation.en: I did. Yeah, it worked. Right? Look, I do. We both have a…
translation.zh: 是的 很管用 对吧？ 你瞧 我做到了 我们有一个…虽然完全没有运动细胞…

translation.en: -Well, not athletic at all-- -Hey! What the heck?
translation.zh: 你瞧 我做到了 我们有一个…虽然完全没有运动细胞… -嘿！搞什么？-不过…

translation.en: -Not even badminton. Not Frisbee. -[Alex] Okay.
translation.zh: -连羽毛球和飞盘都不会-好吧

translation.en: Playing checkers, she falls down.
translation.zh: 她连下跳棋都会摔跤

translation.en: -I'm just saying. -[Teresa] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -老天-我只是说说

translation.en: -[Alex] Oh, my God! -That was when you played at Temple?
translation.zh: 天啊！ 当时你在天普大学打球？

translation.en: I played at Temple. Yeah. How'd you know that?
translation.zh: 我在天普大学打球没错 你是怎么知道的？

translation.en: Come on, Stanley. You follow me to my home,
translation.zh: 拜托 斯坦利 你跟踪我回家

translation.en: offer me, like, crazy money,
translation.zh: 提出给我一大笔钱

translation.en: you don't think I'll look you up on Internet?
translation.zh: 你以为我不会上网查你的底细吗？

translation.en: Number 22. Double Deuce.
Somebody did his homework, unlike somebody else.
translation.zh: 有人做了功课 不像有些人

translation.en: Well, Stan can ball. You do know he can handle the rock.
translation.zh: 斯坦打球很厉害的 -你知道他打球很厉害吧？-我…不

translation.en: -Stanley? -If he didn't get hurt,
translation.zh: -斯坦利？-如果他没受伤 就不是现在这样了

translation.en: -it'd have been a different story. -Who wants coffee?
translation.zh: -斯坦利？-如果他没受伤 就不是现在这样了 谁想喝咖啡？你想喝吗？我去泡咖啡

translation.en: -You want coffee? I'll get coffee. -Spanish coffee, please.
translation.zh: 谁想喝咖啡？你想喝吗？我去泡咖啡 -我要西班牙咖啡 谢谢-好的

translation.en: [Stanley] Okay. I'm gonna go to Spain. I'll be right back, guys.
translation.zh: -我要西班牙咖啡 谢谢-好的 我去趟西班牙 马上就回来

translation.en: Yo. Leon. Thanks for getting back so quickly.
translation.zh: 喂 利昂 谢谢你这么快回我电话

translation.en: [Leon] I'm sorry. The list is locked.
translation.zh: 嘿 抱歉 名单已经锁定了

translation.en: [Stanley] What? I thought you said you could get it done.
translation.zh: 什么意思？你不是说你能搞定吗？

translation.en: You should've told me about all this shit before I called all around the league,
translation.zh: 听着 你应该早点告诉我那件事 害得我到处给联盟的人打电话 替他担保

translation.en: vouching for this guy.
translation.zh: 害得我到处给联盟的人打电话 替他担保

translation.en: Shit. What? What shit you talking about?
translation.zh: 哪件事？你在说什么？

translation.en: He's got an assault charge. And Vince is all over TV talking about it.
translation.zh: 他遭到过伤人指控文斯正在电视上大谈这件事

translation.en: [Anthony] And joining us now, the co-owner of the 76ers, Vince Merrick.
translation.zh: 我们请来了76人队的共同所有人文斯·梅里克

translation.en: -Vince, thanks for being here tonight. -Thanks for having me.
translation.zh: -文斯 谢谢你今晚来上节目-谢谢邀请

translation.en: So, Vince, is it true the Sixers brought in Bo Cruz,
translation.zh: 文斯 76人队是否真的将遭到过伤人指控的

translation.en: who has a history of assault, to play in the combine?
translation.zh: 博·克鲁兹找来让他参加联合选秀？

translation.en: [Vin] No. Bo Cruz has no affiliation with the 76ers.
translation.zh: 没这回事 博·克鲁兹跟76人队没有任何关系

translation.en: He was brought over here by a disgruntled employee, Stanley Sugerman.
translation.zh: 他是被一名心怀不满的员工斯坦利·苏格曼找来的

translation.en: I specifically told Mr. Sugerman not to bring him over.
translation.zh: 我还专门吩咐过苏格曼先生不要把他带过来

translation.en: He lied to the organization and to this young man.
translation.zh: 他欺骗了球队和这个年轻人

translation.en: Mr. Sugerman's selfish behavior has been part of his track record.
translation.zh: 苏格曼先生一贯自私自利

translation.en: He's been let go. He's no longer part of the 76ers.
translation.zh: 他被解雇了已经不是76人队的员工了

translation.en: [Anthony] Vince, we loved your father. Thank you for bringing this story to us.
translation.zh: 文斯 我们都爱你的父亲谢谢你将这件事告诉我们

translation.en: Hey, Bo. Just get in the car, man. Let me talk to you.
translation.zh: 嘿 阿博 上车吧 我们谈谈

translation.en: What are you gonna do? Walk to Spain? Just please, let me--
translation.zh: 你想怎么样？走路去西班牙吗？拜托你让我…

translation.en: -You fucking lied to me! -I know.
translation.zh: -你他妈的骗我！-好的 我知道

translation.en: -You lied to me. -All right. He's all right.
translation.zh: -你他妈骗我 我为你辞掉了工作！-没事 他没事

translation.en: I quit my job for you! You said "trust," and I fucking trust you.
translation.zh: -你他妈骗我 我为你辞掉了工作！-没事 他没事 你让我信任你 我信了

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -You gambled with my life!
translation.zh: -对不起-你拿我的前途赌博！

translation.en: -It wasn't a gamble. It was a sure thing. -It's fucking over.
translation.zh: 不是赌博 我有把握 结束了 我们分道扬镳 听到了吗？

translation.en: You and me is fucking over! You hear me? Over!
translation.zh: 结束了 我们分道扬镳 听到了吗？ -结束了！-嘿 别这样

translation.en: -Hey. No. Just stop. Right now. Please. -[police siren whooping]
translation.zh: -结束了！-嘿 别这样 住手 拜托了

translation.en: Don't throw it all away.
translation.zh: 不要自毁前途

translation.en: I'm begging you, just let go of me. Get in the car. It's not worth it.
translation.zh: 我求你了 放开我 上车 这样不值得 为了我不值得 住手

translation.en: I'm not worth it. Just stop. Okay.
translation.zh: 这样不值得 为了我不值得 住手 好吧

translation.en: All right. Get in the car.
translation.zh: 好 上车

translation.en: -[officer] Everything okay here? -Hey, guys. Yeah. Everything's good.
translation.zh: -没事吧？-你们好 对 没事

translation.en: When Lucia was two…
translation.zh: 露西娅两岁那年…

translation.en: her mom, Maria, asked me for her.
translation.zh: 她母亲玛利亚让我把露西娅给她

translation.en: She didn't wanna share custody anymore.
translation.zh: 她不想继续分享监护权

translation.en: I asked her, "Why?"
translation.zh: 我问她原因

translation.en: She told me it was her boyfriend.
translation.zh: 她说是她男朋友的主意

translation.en: He told her they can get money from the government if she got Lucia.
translation.zh: 他对她说 如果她得到露西娅政府就会给他们发钱

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: I went to his home.
translation.zh: 我去到他家

translation.en: I swear, I just wanna talk to him.
translation.zh: 我发誓 我本来只想跟他谈谈

translation.en: I know I make a mistake.
translation.zh: 我知道我犯了错

translation.en: But I'm not how they say I am.
translation.zh: 但我不是他们说的那样

translation.en: I get it.
translation.zh: 我懂

translation.en: You don't get shit, man.
translation.zh: 你懂个屁

translation.en: You live in your perfect world, with your perfect family.
translation.zh: 你住在完美的世界中 家庭幸福美满

translation.en: One night, after a game at Villanova, we went to a party.
translation.zh: 有天晚上 在维拉诺瓦大学打完比赛 我们去参加一个派对

translation.en: Me and Leon.
translation.zh: 我和利昂

translation.en: And on the way home, I…
translation.zh: 回家的路上 我…

translation.en: I had a few drinks in me.
translation.zh: 我喝了几杯酒

translation.en: I looked down at the radio.
translation.zh: 我低头调收音机

translation.en: When I looked back up, I saw a telephone pole.
translation.zh: 抬头的时候 我看见一根电线杆

translation.en: I shot my hand out
translation.zh: 我伸出手

translation.en: to stop Leon from flying through the windshield.
translation.zh: 阻止利昂撞破挡风玻璃飞出去

translation.en: He still got banged up a little bit, but my hand was pulp.
translation.zh: 他还是被撞了一下但我的手撞得稀烂

translation.en: I cost Leon and all my teammates a shot at the NCAA title that year.
translation.zh: 我让利昂和全部队友失去了 那年夺得大学生篮球联赛冠军的机会

translation.en: I got to think about that.
translation.zh: 我反思了这件事

translation.en: I mean, really, really marinate in it
translation.zh: 想了很久很久

translation.en: for six months in jail.
translation.zh: 在监狱里想了六个月

translation.en: Everything I worked for.
translation.zh: 我为之努力的一切

translation.en: My whole life.
translation.zh: 我的整个人生

translation.en: Everything I wanted.
translation.zh: 我想要的一切

translation.en: Gone.
translation.zh: 付诸东流

translation.en: [Stanley] Half the fucking list are favors!
translation.zh: 名单上有一半的人都是凭人情现在我不要求你卖人情

translation.en: I'm not asking for a favor. This guy can play!
translation.zh: 名单上有一半的人都是凭人情现在我不要求你卖人情 这家伙打得很好！

translation.en: Everybody keeps saying that. That--
translation.zh: 所有人都这样说 这…

translation.en: But you don't know the whole story.
translation.zh: 但你知道事情的来龙去脉

translation.en: He's-- Meet the kid!
translation.zh: 他…见见他吧！

translation.en: Just set it up! I'll bring him anywhere! Anywhere! He'll play anyone!
translation.zh: 安排一下！让我带他去哪儿都行！随便什么地方！跟谁打都行！

translation.en: Will you-- Yes. Ryan!
translation.zh: 你就…是的 莱恩！

translation.en: Yes, I know. I know.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道

translation.en: And you almost didn't let Damian Lillard play!
translation.zh: 当初你们差点没让达米恩·利拉德入选

translation.en: Right! So, you do make mistakes!
translation.zh: 对！所以你们也会犯错！

translation.en: Don't make a mistake on this kid. I'm begging you, pal. For…
translation.zh: 别在这个孩子身上犯错我求你了 伙计 为了…

translation.en: For your sake, not just mine!
translation.zh: 为了你自己 不只是为了我！

translation.en: God damn it. I spoke at your father's camp every year!
translation.zh: 见鬼 我每年都在你父亲的活动上讲话

translation.en: And I never asked for anything back! Okay?
translation.zh: 我从未要求你还我人情！好吗？

translation.en: So I'm asking you now for something! Please help me!
translation.zh: 现在我有事求你！帮帮我！

translation.en: Jesus Christ!
translation.zh: 老天！

translation.en: You know what? I have…
translation.zh: 知道吗？我已经…

translation.en: been in this league for 30 years, and it's like I'm nothing.
translation.zh: 我在联盟混了30年了 现在感觉… 我无足轻重

translation.en: It's like I wasn't even here.
translation.zh: 就像我不曾来过

translation.en: Stanley, it's not about the last play.
translation.zh: 斯坦利 上一场比赛 不重要

translation.en: It's about the next one, right?
translation.zh: 重要的是下一场比赛 对吧？

translation.en: That's if you're in the game, T. I wasn't even in the game.
translation.zh: 那要能上场才行 阿特我已经不在场上了

translation.en: [softly] It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事的

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: Hey. Wake up.
translation.zh: 嘿 醒醒

translation.en: -You fell asleep in the chair. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 你在椅子上睡着了

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -Hey, Dad, I was thinking-- -Just a second, let me finish this.
translation.zh: -嘿 爸爸 我在想…-等一下 让我发完这条短信

translation.en: Stan, you're gonna give yourself a heart attack.
translation.zh: 斯坦 你这样会心脏病发作的 是啊

translation.en: -People just need to see him play, right? -Certain people. Yeah.
translation.zh: 只要让大家看到他打球就行了 对吧？ 某些人 是的

translation.en: Well, remember that video you showed me of your doctor friend?
translation.zh: 还记得你给我看的你那个博士朋友的视频吗？

translation.en: -[Stanley] My doctor friend? -[Teresa chuckles]
translation.zh: 我的博士朋友？

translation.en: We take the right one home from the hospital?
translation.zh: 我们是不是从医院抱错孩子了？

translation.en: [Teresa] That's Dr. J. He's not a real doctor.
translation.zh: 他叫J博士 亲爱的 他不是真的博士

translation.en: Oh. Well, whatever. That video has, like, two million views.
translation.zh: 无所谓啦 那个视频有两百万次观看

translation.en: -I was thinking-- -I can't ask him to do that.
translation.zh: -我在想…-我不能要求他那样做

translation.en: Well, I can.
translation.zh: -我可以-不

translation.en: -[Stanley] No, no. -[Teresa] No, I'm gonna ask him.
translation.zh: -我可以-不 不 我要请他帮忙

translation.en: Hey, sweetie. It's T.
translation.zh: 嘿 亲爱的 我是阿特

translation.en: This is gonna be good.
translation.zh: 会很不错的

translation.en: [man] Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 大家听着

translation.en: I was hoping you could help us out with something.
translation.zh: 我想请你们帮个忙

translation.en: -Yo, is that who I think it is? -Yeah, that's Dr. J.
translation.zh: 他是那个人吗？ 是的 他是J博士 没错

translation.en: [boy] Yo, Doc! Say "what's up" for my story!
translation.zh: -博士 为我的快拍说一声“大家好”！-哟

translation.en: Yo. That's my friend Bo Cruz over there. They call him the Boa.
translation.zh: -博士 为我的快拍说一声“大家好”！-哟 那是我的朋友博·克鲁兹 大家都叫他蟒蛇 知道为什么吗？

translation.en: You know why they call him that?
translation.zh: 大家都叫他蟒蛇 知道为什么吗？

translation.en: Because he squeezes the life out of his prey.
translation.zh: 因为他能把猎物缠死

translation.en: [Stanley] So, guys, here's the deal.
translation.zh: 大家听着 是这样的 我这里有钱

translation.en: I got money here. He's gonna go out on the court.
translation.zh: 大家听着 是这样的 我这里有钱 他将上场

translation.en: Somebody gets a shot off him and can hit the rim,
translation.zh: 谁能在他的防守下投篮击中篮筐

translation.en: I'll give you 50 bucks.
translation.zh: 我就给他50块

translation.en: If you put a bucket in against this guy, we'll give you 100 bucks.
translation.zh: 如果能在他的防守下得分我们就给他100块

translation.en: If you beat him in a game of one-on-one to five,
translation.zh: 如果能在一对一的较量中率先拿到五分

translation.en: we'll give you 1,000 bucks. What do you say?
translation.zh: 我们就给他一千块 怎么样？

translation.en: -[excited chatter] -I got next.
translation.zh: -我下一个-什么？

translation.en: All right. Let's go.
translation.zh: 好 开始吧

translation.en: We got one!
translation.zh: 击中篮筐了！

translation.en: Holy shit. Bo Cruz. Where did this kid come from?
translation.zh: 我去！博·克鲁兹这小子从哪儿冒出来的？

translation.en: Yo, Bo Cruz. I wish I had you on my Rutgers team in the '70s.
translation.zh: 博·克鲁兹 要是我70年代的破纪录球队中有你就好了

translation.en: We talkin' about practice? Man don't need no practice.
translation.zh: 还说什么训练 这家伙不需要训练

translation.en: A legend in the making. You heard it from your man AI.
translation.zh: 他是未来的传奇这是你们的好兄弟AI说的

translation.en: If you not here, you not nowhere.
translation.zh: 不来这里看看 实在是太可惜了

translation.en: [Dan Patrick] …been taking on streetball legends, NBA players. Doesn't care.
translation.zh: …对阵街球高手和NBA球员他轻松自如

translation.en: Why aren't they inviting him to the combine?
translation.zh: 他们为何不邀请他参加联合选秀？

translation.en: That's why you have the combine for players like this.
translation.zh: 联合选秀就是为这种球员而设

translation.en: Let the world see this talent.
translation.zh: 让世人看到这个天才吧

translation.en: It's ridiculous what he's doing out there. This ain't no gimmick, this real.
translation.zh: 他的球技出神入化听着 这不是噱头 这是真的

translation.en: The Boa needs to get to the combine.
translation.zh: 必须让蟒蛇参加联合选秀

translation.en: As much as it pains me to say this, you two guys are right.
translation.zh: 虽然我不想承认 但你们说得对

translation.en: This kid Bo Cruz is special.
translation.zh: 博·克鲁兹这孩子太特别了

translation.en: Bo Cruz. How does it feel getting into the combine?
translation.zh: 博·克鲁兹进入联合选秀是什么感觉？

translation.en: The combine? I'm in the combine? You are as of 30 minutes ago.
translation.zh: -联合选秀？我进入联合选秀了？-30分钟前进入的

translation.en: Have you thought about what team you wanna play for?
translation.zh: 你想过要为哪支球队效力吗？

translation.en: -It'd be an honor to play for any team. -I tell you what.
translation.zh: -加入任何一支球队都是我的荣幸-我来说吧

translation.en: He could be playing for the Sixers right now,
translation.zh: 本来他应该已经在为76人队效力了

translation.en: but Vince Merrick didn't want him. He specifically said that. You remember?
translation.zh: 但文斯·梅里克不要他 这是他特别吩咐的 你还记得吗？

translation.en: Anthony, you remember that, right?
translation.zh: 安东尼 你还记得吧？

translation.en: -You were interviewing him. -That's right.
translation.zh: -当时你在采访他-是的 没错

translation.en: He's 22. You're messing with his life.
translation.zh: 他才22岁 你毁了他的前途

translation.en: -What kind of ballplayer-- -Hang on.
translation.zh: -拜托 你觉得他是什么样的…-等一下

translation.en: Have some respect for your profession. Get the whole story next time.
translation.zh: 请你尊重你的职业下次别再片面报道了

translation.en: What kind of ballplayer-- I'll answer that question.
translation.zh: 我觉得他是什么样的球员？我来回答这个问题

translation.en: This guy is as if Scottie Pippen and a wolf had a baby,
translation.zh: 他就像是斯科蒂·皮蓬跟一头狼生的孩子

translation.en: and Lisa Leslie raised him.
translation.zh: 并且由丽莎·莱斯莉养大

translation.en: And Allen Iverson was the babysitter.
translation.zh: 艾伦·艾弗森是他的保姆

translation.en: It gets weird, that stuff. But you handled it great.
translation.zh: 刚才有点怪怪的 但你应对得很好

translation.en: What else is bothering you? Tell me.
translation.zh: 你还有什么烦恼？告诉我

translation.en: Nothing. See you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 没什么 明天见

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [Teresa] So, he got into the combine, and he's not excited?
translation.zh: 他进了联合选秀 却一点都不兴奋？

translation.en: He's in his own head. He's not telling me anything.
translation.zh: 他有心事 他什么都不跟我说

translation.en: -[sighs] -Well, maybe he's just sad.
translation.zh: 也许他只是有点难过

translation.en: Eh. I think he's overwhelmed. The pressure's getting to him.
translation.zh: 我觉得他是不知所措毕竟压力太大了

translation.en: Mm-mm. I bet it's the kid. Lucia.
translation.zh: 肯定是因为那个孩子 露西娅

translation.en: I mean, he's never been away from her.
translation.zh: 毕竟他从未跟她分开过

translation.en: Like ever.
translation.zh: 从来没有

translation.en: [Stanley] Okay, here we go.
translation.zh: 好 我们到了

translation.en: Superstars don't carry their own bags. I got this.
translation.zh: 巨星不会自己拎行李 我来吧

translation.en: I'll meet you in the lobby in one hour, okay?
translation.zh: 一小时后我在大堂等你 好吗？

translation.en: This is very, very good.
translation.zh: 这太棒了

translation.en: Ray Hancock can't stop working his ass off.
translation.zh: 雷·汉考克工作起来就是这么拼命

translation.en: Come on. Come on. Come with me.
translation.zh: 来吧 跟我来

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: When you train for a marathon,
translation.zh: 马拉松选手在训练时

translation.en: you don't run 20 miles the day before the race. You do nothing.
translation.zh: 不会在比赛前一天跑30公里而是会好好休息

translation.en: All we could do now is get you hurt or wear you out.
translation.zh: 现在训练只会让你受伤或筋疲力尽

translation.en: So we're gonna do this.
translation.zh: 所以我们做这个

translation.en: -[Bo] Lucia! -Papi!
translation.zh: -露西娅！-爸爸！

translation.en: [Stanley] Boa challenge is still trending.
translation.zh: “挑战蟒蛇”的热度未减

translation.en: People are excited to see what you're gonna do tomorrow.
translation.zh: 大家很期待你明天的表现

translation.en: Look at this. Look at this.
translation.zh: 你看

translation.en: You think I know that many people? This is all for you, pal.
translation.zh: 你觉得我会认识这么多人吗？ 他们都是支持你的 伙计

translation.en: -That's for us. -Okay, it's for us. Let's get 'em.
translation.zh: 是支持我们 好吧 支持我们 让他们开开眼

translation.en: Tomorrow, they're gonna be watching you. Every move you make, the camera's on you.
translation.zh: 明天他们会考察你 你的每一个动作都会被拍下来

translation.en: And it's not just about how you play. It's the intangibles.
translation.zh: 而且不只是你的球技还有无形的东西

translation.en: More important than making a shot is how you handle missing a shot.
translation.zh: 比投篮命中更重要的是你投篮失误后的心理素质

translation.en: Shit's gonna go wrong. So what?
translation.zh: 失误是难免的 那又如何？

translation.en: You've dealt with adversity your whole goddamn life.
translation.zh: -你一辈子都在面对逆境-是的

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Stanley] It's Bo's turn.
translation.zh: -你一辈子都在面对逆境-是的 轮到你出头了

translation.en: You're nervous, huh?
translation.zh: 紧张吧？

translation.en: It's all right.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: Hey. Clyde Drexler used to get so nervous before games
translation.zh: 嘿 克莱德·德雷克斯勒以前经常在比赛前

translation.en: that he'd actually faint.
translation.zh: 紧张到晕倒 我没开玩笑

translation.en: I'm not kidding you. The guy did it so much
translation.zh: 紧张到晕倒 我没开玩笑 由于他动不动就晕倒他的队友不得不随时跟着他

translation.en: his teammates followed him around so they could catch him.
translation.zh: 由于他动不动就晕倒他的队友不得不随时跟着他 以便扶着他 后来这成了一种仪式

translation.en: It became kind of a ritual.
translation.zh: 以便扶着他 后来这成了一种仪式

translation.en: It's good to be nervous. It means you give a shit.
translation.zh: 紧张是好事 说明你在乎

translation.en: -All right? -All right.
translation.zh: -好吗？-好

translation.en: -Mama, you'll get him to sleep? -Okay.
translation.zh: 伯母 让他早点睡觉 -好-好

translation.en: Okay. Lucia, go easy on the Pringles.
translation.zh: -好-好 露西娅 少吃点薯片

translation.en: -All right. Adiós. -[Paola laughs]
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: -[Paola] Adiós. -Bo Cruz.
translation.zh: 博·克鲁兹

translation.en: You're gonna Cruz-ify them tomorrow. Huh?
translation.zh: 明天你要克死他们

translation.en: -It's still not funny. Get out. -It's no good?
translation.zh: -还是不好笑 出去-不好笑吗？

translation.en: -Good night, my man. -Good night.
translation.zh: -晚安 伙计-晚安

translation.en: Crush 'em.
translation.zh: 踩扁他们

translation.en: -[woman] So, this is their shot? -[man] It is a big deal to be here.
translation.zh: 这是他们的机会吗？ 来到这里很重要

translation.en: [woman] What kind of advice do you have for this guy?
translation.zh: 你对他有什么建议？

translation.en: [man] This guy? Yeah, I've seen him play. He's got a lot of talent. He's got it all.
translation.zh: 他吗？ 我看过他打球 他很有天分 技术很全面

translation.en: He can do a bit of everything. I don't think he needs any advice from me.
translation.zh: 他很有天分 技术很全面 我觉得他不需要我的建议

translation.en: Yeah, most guys in your position would not be here.
translation.zh: 处在你这个位置的人大多数不会来这里

translation.en: You're already a lottery pick. So what's your goal?
translation.zh: 你已经被选中了所以你的目标是什么？

translation.en: Just gonna tear it up and dominate and let the world know.
translation.zh: 大杀八方 称霸全场让别人知道我的厉害

translation.en: You like that, Khris?
translation.zh: 喜欢这句话吗 克里斯？

translation.en: -Cocky bastard, ain't he? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 自大的混蛋 对吧？ 对

translation.en: You against you. All right?
translation.zh: 你的对手是你自己 好吗？

translation.en: We've done this a hundred times. It's just another workout.
translation.zh: 我们练过上百次了 就当是一次训练

translation.en: You're an iceberg.
translation.zh: 你是一座冰山

translation.en: Focus. Kick some ass.
translation.zh: 要专注 教训他们

translation.en: That's good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Have fun out there. Where do you wanna sit?
translation.zh: 玩得开心点 来吧 你想坐哪儿？

translation.en: -Double D! I see you! -Yeah! Hey, Leon.
translation.zh: -22号！我看到你了！-嘿 利昂

translation.en: Come on, guys.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Hey, yo, Stan. He can fly. Damn. He can fly, man.
translation.zh: 嘿 斯坦 他速度很快 快极了

translation.en: -Tell Coach. [chuckles] -Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -告诉教练-好的

translation.en: Thanks, Khris.
translation.zh: 谢了 克里斯

translation.en: It's from football.
translation.zh: 这是踢球练出来的

translation.en: Okay. Well, then, soccer is good.
translation.zh: 好的 足球很不错

translation.en: I hate soccer. I can't say that. I really do hate that sport.
translation.zh: 我讨厌足球 我不能这么说我真的很讨厌足球

translation.en: He's quick, but can he shoot?
translation.zh: 他很快 但他会投篮吗？

translation.en: He can shoot.
translation.zh: 他会投篮

translation.en: Olé, bitch.
translation.zh: 嘿 贱人

translation.en: Fran Fraschilla here at the NBA draft combine.
translation.zh: 弗朗西斯·弗拉斯奇拉在NBA联合选秀现场为你报道

translation.en: Bo Cruz and Kermit Wilts crushed it yesterday,
translation.zh: 博·克鲁兹和克米特·威尔茨昨天技压全场

translation.en: blowing the roof off with the speed and agility drills.
translation.zh: 博·克鲁兹和克米特·威尔茨昨天技压全场 用速度和敏捷的身手引爆了全场

translation.en: I cannot wait for this match-up.
translation.zh: 我很期待这场比赛

translation.en: We've been watching Kermit since his AAU days.
translation.zh: 早在克米特打业余比赛时我们就看他打球了

translation.en: We know he's gonna be an NBA star,
translation.zh: 我们知道他会成为NBA球星

translation.en: but this kid, Bo Cruz, he's come out of nowhere.
translation.zh: 但博·克鲁兹这个孩子不知道从哪儿冒出来的

translation.en: I thought I knew every international player on the planet,
translation.zh: 我自认为天下没有我不认识的国际球员

translation.en: but this kid is a revelation.
translation.zh: 但这个孩子让我大开眼界

translation.en: It'll be a good game.
translation.zh: 这场比赛会很精彩

translation.en: Of course he's nervous, but I told him the whole Clyde Drexler
translation.zh: 他当然紧张 但我跟他讲了 克莱德·德雷克斯勒在赛前晕倒的故事

translation.en: fainting-before-every-game story, and that calmed him down.
translation.zh: 克莱德·德雷克斯勒在赛前晕倒的故事 他就镇定了

translation.en: Clyde-- That was me who fainted before every meet, not Clyde Drexler.
translation.zh: 克莱德…比赛前晕倒的人是我 不是克莱德·德雷克斯勒

translation.en: That was you? Sorry. Just…
translation.zh: 是你吗？ 抱歉 那…

translation.en: Either way, it worked. He's… He's feeling good.
translation.zh: 总之有效果 现在他感觉良好

translation.en: My wife says hi. My wife says hello.
translation.zh: 我妻子向你们问好 -我妻子问候你们-嗨

translation.en: -Oh, hi. -Hello, hello. They're excited.
translation.zh: -我妻子问候你们-嗨 你好 他们很兴奋

translation.en: Okay. I love you. I'm gonna watch the game.
translation.zh: 好 我爱你 我要看比赛了

translation.en: Strong like bull, huh?
translation.zh: 像阿博一样强壮 对吧？

translation.en: My bad. It's the Boa now.
translation.zh: 我的错 现在你叫蟒蛇了

translation.en: Hashtag Boa.
translation.zh: #蟒蛇

translation.en: They call you that 'cause you swallow anything, right?
translation.zh: 他们叫你蟒蛇是因为你什么都吞 对吧？

translation.en: Unhinge that jaw. Hey.
translation.zh: 把嘴巴张开 嘿

translation.en: Hey, you hear me? Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿 听到没有？ 嘿

translation.en: And we're off. Here we go.
translation.zh: 开始了

translation.en: -That's it! That's it! -[cheers in Spanish]
translation.zh: 很好！

translation.en: Good start, Bo.
translation.zh: 开局不错 阿博

translation.en: On your left, Bo. On it.
translation.zh: 你左边 阿博

translation.en: That's all right.
translation.zh: 没关系！

translation.en: Let's get out and go. Get out and go. Run wide.
translation.zh: 压上去 跑快点

translation.en: I'm good. I'm good.
translation.zh: 我很好

translation.en: That a baby!
translation.zh: 好样的！

translation.en: Go get it. Go get it.
translation.zh: 去抢球

translation.en: [man] Time out!
translation.zh: 暂停！

translation.en: These guys behind us are drooling over him.
translation.zh: 暂停！ 后面那些家伙聊他聊得口沫横飞

translation.en: Go, Papa.
translation.zh: 加油 爸爸

translation.en: That your little girl over there? What's her name?
translation.zh: 那是你女儿吗？她叫什么名字？

translation.en: Easy, boy. Acting like I asked her out or something.
translation.zh: 别激动 我又不会约她出去

translation.en: Just trying to get to know you.
translation.zh: 我只是想了解你

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 糟了

translation.en: Where's her mom at?
translation.zh: 她妈妈在哪儿？

translation.en: Oh, okay. I see what's going on. That's your mom.
translation.zh: 好吧 我知道是怎么回事了 那是你妈

translation.en: Is it legal to have a kid with your mom in Spain? We don't roll like that out here.
translation.zh: 在西班牙跟老妈生孩子合法吗？美国人不会这样做

translation.en: Hey, I know you hear me. Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿 我知道你听见了 嘿

translation.en: Yo. Greg. Greg.
translation.zh: 喂 格雷格

translation.en: -Communicate to each other. -Give my kid a breather.
translation.zh: -相互沟通-把我的人换下来

translation.en: He pushed me.
translation.zh: 他推我

translation.en: Take him out. Give him a rest.
translation.zh: 格雷格 把他换下来 让他休息一下

translation.en: -Stanley, we got it. -You don't have it.
translation.zh: 格雷格 把他换下来 让他休息一下 -斯坦利 我心里有数-你心里没数

translation.en: [softly] Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 老天

translation.en: Where's her mama anyway? How come she ain't here?
translation.zh: 她妈妈呢？她怎么没来？

translation.en: She probably shackin' it up with somebody else.
translation.zh: 她可能正在跟别人滚床单

translation.en: Tell her to shack it up with me.
translation.zh: 叫她跟我滚床单吧

translation.en: I'd be a great stepdad. Give her a real man to look up to.
translation.zh: 我会是一个很棒的继父给她一个真男人让她敬仰

translation.en: Huh? What you got?
translation.zh: 你有什么本事？

translation.en: Keep coming. Keep coming.
translation.zh: 继续

translation.en: Good. Good. Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Look. She likes me.
translation.zh: 瞧 她喜欢我

translation.en: -[whistle blows] -Hey! Bo! Bo!
translation.zh: 嘿！阿博！

translation.en: [Stanley, echoes] Bo!
translation.zh: 阿博！

translation.en: Get off me.
translation.zh: 别碰我

translation.en: [Anthony] I've been coming to the NBA draft combines for a long time,
translation.zh: 我参加NBA联合选秀很多次了

translation.en: and what you don't wanna do is show the NBA scouts and GMs that you can't keep your cool.
translation.zh: 绝对不能让NBA球探和经理看到你控制不住情绪

translation.en: This is gonna hurt him. This is a problem. Kermit's really…
translation.zh: 这会对他造成伤害 这是个麻烦 克米特非常…

translation.en: They got him labeled now. "Violent kid from a violent neighborhood."
translation.zh: 现在他被贴上标签了 “来自暴力社区的暴力小孩”

translation.en: You know how it works.
translation.zh: 你知道会有什么后果

translation.en: Ron Artest?
translation.zh: 记得罗恩·阿泰斯特吗？

translation.en: He beat up the entire city of Detroit, and everybody loves him.
translation.zh: 他曾在底特律大打出手现在大家都热爱他

translation.en: Just give it some time. That's all it takes.
translation.zh: 过段时间事情就平息了

translation.en: You know, everybody loves a redemption story.
translation.zh: 没有人不喜欢浪子回头的故事
